Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a significant advantage without compromising on cost-effectiveness. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
